summary: Agencies are increasingly investing in products that combine hardware and software—"cyber-physical systems"—to meet their mission needs. Traditional acquisition processes don't support speedy delivery of these systems. Leading companies get these kinds of systems to market quickly using iterative design, testing, and feedback processes. For example, data from simulations and tests are recorded in a "digital thread"—a tool that product teams can access in real time...
title: Leading Practices: Iterative Cycles Enable Rapid Delivery of Complex, Innovative Products
